sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>simple</radical> radical and the <kanji>simple</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: One of the most <kanji>simple</kanji> things in the world is getting a <reading>tan</reading> (<ja>たん</ja>). All you have to do is stand outside long enough. It doesn't matter what skin type you have or what the weather is like. Eventually, if you stand out there long enough, you'll get a tan.
readingInfo: Get a tan, it's simple, stupid! (Though it's terrible for you so uh... don't always take our advice, kay?)
